H0.text: where did benjamin franklin work. Samuel Keimer

H1.text: where did benjamin franklin work. The Pennsylvania Gazette

H2.text: where did benjamin franklin work. Deborah Read Franklin

H3.text: where did benjamin franklin work. Josiah Franklin

A4.text: Franklin not only printed the paper but also often contributed pieces to the paper under aliases.

A5.text: On October 2, 1729, Samuel Keimer, the owner of The Gazette, fell into debt and before fleeing to Barbados sold the newspaper to Benjamin Franklin and his partner Hugh Meredith.
